TopicTitle: There is a Zombie apocalypse. You only have your profile picture to protect you. How do you fare?

Articles.Content: I am a Viking 1 spacecraft,and i hope i still have Fuel,so i can go to Jupiter,unless if... wait.... oh no.
Burn the zombies with the SRBs.
I have the entirety of Florida and its guns to help me. And a rocket that's big as Florida... I think I'll be fine.
I am on Mars with the Viking 1 lander. so I should be fine too!
Brainz!

On 9/6/2020 at 3:35 AM, Space Nerd said:

Burn the zombies with the SRBs.

No, when the apocalypse first started there was a budget cut and you ended up like Buran.
I fare fine. Like... really really fine.

Well, I'm duna, I can kill all the zombies at once!

Along with everyone else...

On 9/6/2020 at 7:42 AM, GuessingEveryDay said:

I have the entirety of Florida and its guns to help me. And a rocket that's big as Florida... I think I'll be fine.

Or, be true to the way of the Florida man, and create a war hammer out of bud light cans.

Edited September 7, 2020 by Lewie
Sorry, I'm staying sober. Gotta keep my wits with me.

Who said you had to empty the bud can first ? They're heavier and deliver more energy on impact if it's full. Also, if you shake them enough and you find a way to pierce the can on demand, to let the beer evacuate from the hammer, you'll have a fuel (kinda) propelled hammer to strike at zombies.

But yeah, you'll do fine.

Me ? not so much. I mean, farting rainbow in the sky while singing a weird song does not sounds like a good survival strategy. But then, maybe I can became a zombie leader somehow ?
I am Kenobi, which means i have the high ground.
Zombies like brains, but not hearts. Especially hearts that are on frozen minor planets.

I have an F-14. I'd be fine until I need to refuel. I don't know where the refueling connections are for the 14......... So I am fine for a while.

On 9/12/2020 at 12:37 AM, MarsBy2024OrBust said:

I am Kenobi, which means i have the high ground.

It's over zombies, I have the high ground!

On 9/6/2020 at 9:51 AM, The Doodling Astronaut said:

I am on Mars with the Viking 1 lander. so I should be fine too!

With my new profile pic. I think I might be fare off to with a spacesuit to protect myself along with the flashing colors to hurt the zombie eyes.

Although I'll ask my gator buddies to become horses, and the snakes to be the riders. Along with an Eel whip.

Edited September 24, 2020 by GuessingEveryDay

Earth is quote-unquote impure, so she would have to get to the moon so no help there. Unless one can strike up a “state of the world” conversation before they hit the road.

Also, surely the lunar capital has the power to deorbit the moon, so uh... Legend of Zelda: Majora’s Mask but you want the moon to crash?

Discussing the practical applications to the powers of Touhou characters lead to canned doomsday, there are no two ways about it.
it must yeet into the zombies
I'm dead.

PURGE THE NUGLE SCUM FROM THE FACE OF THE PLANET. FIGHT FOR THE EMPEROR AND PURIFY THE PLANET WITH FIRE!

As a blud reven I also have extreme salvaging and requisition skills.

The zombie apocalypse is probably dead.

Edited October 1, 2020 by Sidestrafe2462
I would save all zombies in file and reupload them in other place, like I did it with my profile picture.
I have an astroneer, so he could print a shuttle and get both of us out of here.
I have a lander on the Mun for my profile pic, so I should be fine since I can go to Kerbin... unless the Zombies are on Kerbin or the mun...
Well I have lods of emone so I should be able to pay for a massive bunker
Did you know that zombies are the lynx's favourite food?
